maqras.text: mudeomsog-e issneun geosdeul-i bakk-eulo nawa sansanhi heut-eojigo
geuui simjung-e issneun geosdeul-i balg hyeojimyeo
geunal junimkkeseo geugeosdeul-eul a sim-eulo chungmanhadaneun geos-eul ingan-eun alji moshaneunyo
buhwal-ui nal
buhwal-ui nal-i mueos-inyo
buhwal-ui nal-i mueos-inji mueos-igeudaeege seolmyeonghaliyo
geunal-eun ingan-i nabangcheoleom heut-eojineun nal-imyeo
sandeul-eun gajileonhan yangteolcheoleom doeneun nallo
geunal geuui seonhaeng-i mugeoun ja neun
anlaghan salm-eul yeong-wihal geos-ina
geuui seonhaeng-i gabyeoun janeun
buljiog-ui hamjeong-e issge doelila
buljiog-ui hamjeong-i mueos-inji mueos-i geudaeege seolmyeonghalyeo juliyo
geugeos-eun gyeoglyeolhage taoleuneun buljiog-ila
chugjeoghan geosdeul-i neohuileul beos-eonage halini
neohuiga mudeom-eulo gal ttae kkaji omanhalyeo haneunyo
geuleona neohuineun god alge doeli la
sillo neohuineun god alge doelila
neohuiga bunmyeonghan jisig-eul gajgo issdamyeon neohuineun alge doelini
neohuineun jiog-ui bul-eul bol geos-i la
sillo neohuineun bunmyeonghi nun-euloseo moggyeoghal geos-ila
geuleon hu neohuineun neohuiga tamnig haessdeon hyanglag-e gwanhayeo hilmun-eul bad-eul geos-ila
sewol-eul dugo maengsehasa
sillo modeun ingan-eun myeolmangke doe nila
geuleona mid-eum-eulo uiloun il-eulsilcheonhamyeo seologa seolo-ege jinlileulgwongohamyeo innaehaneun jadeul-eun je-oela
dwieseo jungsangmolyaghaneun ja-egejaeang-i iss-euljini
geuneun jaesan-eul moa gyesan-e yeol junghamyeo
geu jaesan-i hyeonseeseo geuleul yeong wonke halila saeng-gaghadoda
geuleona geuleohji anihani geuneun jiog-e deonjyeojilila
geu jiog-i mueos-iji mueos-i geudaeege allyeojuliyo
geugeos-eun hananim-ui bunnoga taneun buljiog-igeoneul
geu tteugeoum-i gaseub-eul ewossago
geudeul-ege mun-i jamgyeojyeo beolimyeo
gidungdeullo bisjang-i naelyeojinola
junimkkeseo kokkiliui mulileul eotteohge hasyeossneunji geu sosig-i ileuji ani haessneunyo
geudeul-ui eummoleul pamyeolsikyeo beoli ji ani haessdeonyo
hananim-eun geudeul-ege saetteleul bo naeeo
molaewa heulg-eulo doen dolmaeng-ideul-eul deonjisyeossnani
geudeul-eun da galg-a meog-eobeolin ma leun ipgwado gat-assdeola
kkuleiswi jog-ui boholeul wihayeo
daesang-eulo hayeogeum gyeoulgwa yeoleum-e anjeonhage yeohaengke hayeossnola
geuleomeulo i jib-ui junim-eul geu deullo hayeogeum gyeongbaetolog hala
geubun-eun geudeul-eul gialobuteo baebullyeo jusyeossgo gongpolobuteo anjeonke hayeo jusyeossnola
naeseleul bujeonghaneun jaleul geudae neun al-assneunyo
geuneun goaleul hagdaehago
bulssanghan ja-ege eumsig-eul jegonghaji anihan jaini
wiseonjeog-in gidoleul haenghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
ideul-eun geudeul-ui gidosaenghwal-eul taemanhi hamyeonseo
nam-ege boigi wihae wiseonjeog-eulo gidohaneun jadeullo
pil-yolo haneun salamdeul-ege insaeghan jadeul-ila
hananim-i geudaeege pungseonghan eunhyeleul bepul-eossnani
junimkke gidohago jemul-eul ba chila
sillo geudaeui jeog-eun modeun huimang eulobuteo danjeoldoen jadeul-ila
bulsinjadeul-ege illeo galodoe
neohuiga sungbaehaneun geos-eul naega sungbaehaji anihamyeo
naega gyeongbaehaneun bun-eul neohuiga gyeongbaehaji anihago
neohuiga sungbaehaessdeon geosdeul-eul naegasungbaehaji anihal geos-imyeo
naega gyeongbaehan geubun-eul neohuiga gyeongbaehaji anh-eul geos-ini
neohuiegeneun neohuiui jong-gyoga issgo na-egeneun naui jong-gyoga iss-eul ppun-ila
hananim-ui doum-eulo seunglihaneungeuttaee
ttejieo hananim-ui jong-gyolo gwiuihaneun baegseongdeul-eul geudaeneun bolini
junim-eul chanmihago junimkke gwan-yong-eul guhala sillo geubun-eun gwan-yong-eulo chungmanhasinila
abulahab-ui son-i myeolmanghago pamyeol hal geos-imyeo
geuui jaemulgwa geuga eod-eun geos-i geuege yuighaji moshani
geuneun god taoleuneun boljiog-e ileuge doel geos-ila
geuui anaeneun yeonlyoleul unbanhal geos-iyo
geunyeoui mog-eneun dandanhi kkoin dong-ajul-i gamgilila
geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala : ‘geubun hananim-eun dan han bun-isila’
’hananim-eun modeun pil-yoleul chowolhasinola’
’geubun-eun nahjido anh-eusigo nah-ajijido anh-eusyeoss-eumyeo’
’geubungwa biseushan geos-eun dan hanado eobsnola’
illeogalodoe dongnyeok-ui junimkke boholeul guhamyeo
changjodoen saaghan geosdeul-ui jaeang-eu lobuteo boholeul guhamyeo
eodum-i jit-eojineun bam-ui jaeang-eu lobuteo boholeul guhamyeo
maedeub-eulo masul-eul bulineun jadeul ui jaeang-eulobuteo boholeul guhamyeo
sigihaneun jaui jaeang-eulobuteo boholeul guhanola
illeogalodoe inlyuui junimkke boholeul guhago
inlyuui wang-imyeo
inlyuui sin-ege
ingan-ui hyungjung-e dosalineun satan wa jaeang-eul
ingan-ui gaseumsog-eseo yuhoghaneun satan-ui yuhog-eul
yeongmawa ingan-ui yuhog-eulobuteo boholeul guhanaida
